titleStmt.title: The diurnall occurrences of every dayes proceeding in Parliament since the beginning thereof, being Tuesday the twentieth of Ianuary, which ended the tenth of March. Anno Dom. 1628. With the arguments of the members of the House then assembled.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. H. and are to be sold by William Cooke, at Furnivals Inne Gate in Holborn,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
